name: MoneyMochabyInvestably
0:
”Alexa, ask Money Mocha to tell me about Michelle Gordon”
”Alexa, ask Money Mocha about Women and Wealth”
”Alexa, ask Money Mocha to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: money mocha
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Money Mocha is brought to you by Investably LLC. At Investably, our purpose is to help you live the life you desire by empowering you towards financial security, well-being, and retirement. We provide you with personalized holistic financial planning that accounts for life's challenges. Along with planning that helps you see the big picture, we create a tax-smart investment strategy to meet your needs in growing wealth and your income needs when you are done working.

Things you can say:

First say, "Alexa, open Money Mocha."

"Tell me about the Founder & CEO" / "Tell me about Michelle Gordon."
"Tell me about Financial Blueprint Masterclass."
"Tell me about Women and Wealth."
"Play the latest update."

Life is not a dress rehearsal.
From our Founder & CEO, Michelle Gordon, CETF®:
"As a 15-year financial professional and STEVIE award-winner, having witnessed highs, lows, booms, busts, and everything in between, I chose to start my own financial practice, Investably LLC, out of a strong desire to help people live a more intentional life.

I sought to create a modern and inclusive financial practice experience focused on a holistic and long-term disciplined approach for helping clients ‘quiet the noise’ and live a more intentional lifestyle and retirement."

Learn more: investably.com

Follow Investably:
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/company/investably-llc/
Twitter: twitter.com/InvestablyRIA
Facebook: Investably LLC

Request a demo to launch your own custom Alexa skill like this at WealthVoice.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
